name: Unsatisfied Gravestone Customer Attack
description:
The days of questionable quality headstone's have finally halted as your former customers have risen from death to speak to your manager. Shovel your way through this grueling crowd of ghouls and make those moles jealous at your excavating skills. Batteries not included

IF YOU ARE EXPERIENCING LAG IN THE BROWSER TRY THE WINDOWS VERSION INSTEAD

Programming - Mezorno 

Art - Whikebain https://www.artstation.com/whikebain

Made for lame jam week 13
